svg.text: Objective: Optimize query patterns, implement batch operations, reduce N+1 queries

g.text: Identified 15 N+1 patterns, documented slow queries, created baseline benchmarks
Refactored 8 endpoints to use bulk inserts, reduced DB calls by 60%
Create missing indexes, optimize JOIN patterns, run final performance comparison
ü§ñ Agent suggests: Focus on crawls table composite index
Consider adding EXPLAIN ANALYZE output to the session notes for documentation.
Based on session history, I recommend:
1. Add a "Query Pattern Catalog" session to document common patterns for future reference
2. Schedule a follow-up session in 2 weeks to verify performance stability
3. Consider linking this plan to the "Agent Tooling Enhancement" plan for js-scan batching
